verses.plain: Now concerning the collection for the saints, as I have given order to the churches of Galatia, even so do ye.

tokens.t: Now concerning the collection for the saints, as I have given order to the churches of Galatia, even so do ye.

verses.plain: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store, as God hath prospered him, that there be no gatherings when I come.

tokens.t: Upon the first
of the week let every one of you lay by him in store, as
hath prospered him, that there be no gatherings when I come.

verses.plain: And when I come, whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters, them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem.

tokens.t: And when I come, whomsoever ye shall approve by
letters, them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem.

verses.plain: And if it be meet that I go also, they shall go with me.

tokens.t: And if it be meet that I go also, they shall go with me.

verses.plain: Now I will come unto you, when I shall pass through Macedonia: for I do pass through Macedonia.

tokens.t: Now I will come unto you, when I shall pass through Macedonia: for I do pass through Macedonia.

verses.plain: And it may be that I will abide, yea, and winter with you, that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go.

tokens.t: And it may be that I will abide, yea, and winter with you, that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go.

verses.plain: For I will not see you now by the way; but I trust to tarry a while with you, if the Lord permit.

tokens.t: For I will not see you now by the way; but I trust to tarry a while with you, if the Lord permit.

verses.plain: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost.

tokens.t: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost.

verses.plain: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me, and there are many adversaries.

tokens.t: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me, and
many adversaries.

verses.plain: Now if Timotheus come, see that he may be with you without fear: for he worketh the work of the Lord, as I also do.

tokens.t: Now if Timotheus come, see that he may be with you without fear: for he worketh the work of the Lord, as I also

verses.plain: Let no man therefore despise him: but conduct him forth in peace, that he may come unto me: for I look for him with the brethren.

tokens.t: Let no man therefore despise him: but conduct him forth in peace, that he may come unto me: for I look for him with the brethren.

verses.plain: As touching our brother Apollos, I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren: but his will was not at all to come at this time; but he will come when he shall have convenient time.

tokens.t: As touching
brother Apollos, I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren: but his will was not at all to come at this time; but he will come when he shall have convenient time.

verses.plain: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.

tokens.t: Watch ye, stand fast in the faith, quit you like men, be strong.

verses.plain: Let all your things be done with charity.

tokens.t: Let all your things be done with charity.

verses.plain: I beseech you, brethren, (ye know the house of Stephanas, that it is the firstfruits of Achaia, and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints,)

tokens.t: I beseech you, brethren, (ye know the house of Stephanas, that it is the firstfruits of Achaia, and
they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints,)

verses.plain: That ye submit yourselves unto such, and to every one that helpeth with us, and laboureth.

tokens.t: That ye submit yourselves unto such, and to every one that helpeth with
, and laboureth.

verses.plain: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus: for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied.

tokens.t: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus: for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied.

verses.plain: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours: therefore acknowledge ye them that are such.

tokens.t: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours: therefore acknowledge ye them that are such.

verses.plain: The churches of Asia salute you. Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord, with the church that is in their house.

tokens.t: The churches of Asia salute you. Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord, with the church that is in their house.

verses.plain: All the brethren greet you. Greet ye one another with an holy kiss.

tokens.t: All the brethren greet you. Greet ye one another with an holy kiss.

verses.plain: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand.

tokens.t: The salutation of
Paul with mine own hand.

verses.plain: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ, let him be Anathema Maranatha.

tokens.t: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ, let him be Anathema Maranatha.

verses.plain: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.

tokens.t: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ
with you.

verses.plain: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus. Amen.

tokens.t: My love
with you all in Christ Jesus. Amen.
